text: The English translation patch for Last Bible III was officially released a few days ago. Just thought I'd mention in case there was anyone interested in playing it that didn't already know this. You can download it here: http://www.romhacking.net/translations/3545/
author: Selim the Succubus

text: oh now this is good. There are some tracks in SMTIV/Apocalypse that sound just like this, love those too.
author: FireKirby7

text: so am I the only person that would buy all of the older smt games if atlus localized them? just port a few of the nes and SNES games to the ps4 or 3ds and I would definitely pick them up. they said they were happy with the sales of the 3ds port of soul hackers so I'm surprised this hasn't already happened
author: creative username

text: I really wish there was a translation available for this game, it's one of the very few solid SNES RPGs left that I want to play, especially since I'm a fan of the Megami series in general. The soundtrack alone makes me want to play it, good stuff.
author: SupraDarky

text: I have good news for you, my friend. The group known as Tom's Translations is currently working on it, and I believe they are over half way done. I simply can't wait for it, myself.
author: Rython n
